* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and the maintenance of her arcade.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
This is Regina. Previously, she used a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her general store. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profits. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and the children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Regina hopes to grow her business in the coming years, and dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: EL SR. MARCO ANTONIO ES UN TRANSPORTISTA DE TAXI EN EL ÁREA URBANA DE SANTA CRUZ DE LA SIERRA, ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA SE  REALIZA DESDE LAS 5:00 DE LA MAÑANA HASTA LAS 13:00 LUEGO SE VA A SU CASA EN DONDE LO ESPERA SU FAMILIA PARA ALMORZAR EL VIVE CON SU MADRE, LUEGO A LAS 16:00 NUEVAMENTE CONTINUA SU LABOR DE SERVICIO DE TAXI HASTA LAS 20:00. EL MES DE AGOSTO DEL PRESENTE AÑO SUFRIÓ UN CHOQUE LO CUAL DEJO CON MAL ASPECTO LA MOVILIDAD  LA PERSONA QUE LE OCASIONO EL DAÑO AL MOTORIZADO SE DIO A LA FUGA POR TAL MOTIVO EL CLIENTE NECESITA REALIZAR UN CAMBIO COMPLETO A SU VEHÍCULO Y CAMBIAR LA SUSPENSIÓN DEL MISMO  , ESE ES EL MOTIVO POR EL QUE SE SOLICITA UN CRÉDITO KIVA PARA EL SEÑOR MARCO ANTONIO , EL OBJETIVO ES APOYARLO PARA QUE SU VEHÍCULO EL CUAL ES SU FUENTE DE INGRESOS PUEDA ESTAR EN OPTIMAS CONDICIONES PARA SERVIR A LOS USUARIOS YA QUE CON EL PRÉSTAMO SE REALIZARA EL CAMBIO DE SUSPENSIÓN Y REFACCIÓN DE LA CARROCERIA EN GENERAL.
texts.en: Marco Antonio is a taxi driver in the urban area of Santa Cruz de la Sierra. He works from 5am to 1pm and afterwards goes home, where his family is waiting for him to eat lunch together. Then at 4pm, he goes out again to continue working as a taxi driver until 8pm. In August this year, he was in an accident, which left his vehicle in bad condition and the person that hit him ran away. Because of this, Marco Antonio needs a complete overhaul of his vehicle and to change the suspension. This is why a Kivaloan is requested for Marco Antonio. The aim is to support him so that his vehicle, which is his source of income, is in optimal condition to serve his customers. With the loan, he will be able to have the suspension changed and general restoration of the bodywork.

loans.use: to repair his automobile (taxi).

loans.name: Geronima

texts.en:
This is Geronima.  She previously borrowed 12,000 PHP, which she used to buy additional stocks of merchandise needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in meeting her personal, household and business expenditures. 

Now, she is applying for another 14,000 PHP, which she will use to buy more merchandise and products for business. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Geronima dreams of expanding her business in the coming years and hopes to have a happy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional clothing, footwear, cosmetics and other products to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy blouses, jeans, and other clothes for her business.

loans.name: Jimena Patricia

texts.es: La señora Jimena de estado civil casada,  ha cursado hasta el nivel primario de la escuela,  actualmente ella tiene 32 años de edad,  es una señora muy responsable, lastimosamente en estos momentos su madre se encuentra en mal estado de salud, por lo que están incurriendo en varios gastos para medicamentos, hospital, y otros. Su señora madre le dejó a cargo de sus bienes y otros responsabilidades en las cuales la señora Jimena está cancelando deudas por el mal estado de salud de su madre, por esta razón ella necesita dinero por que una de sus vaquitas murió, y ella necesita de la producción de leche para seguir generando ingresos y poder cubrir sus deudas, ella quiere superar estos momentos difíciles que está pasando.
texts.en: Jimena is married, has completed primary school and is 32 years old. She is a very responsible woman. Unfortunately, her mother is currently in a bad state of health due to which they are incurring various expenses for medicine, the hospital etc. Her mother left her in charge of her goods and other responsibilities within which Jimena is canceling debts due to her mother’s poor health. This is why she needs money, since one of her cows died and she needs the milk production to continue generating income to be able to cover her debts. She wants to overcome the difficulties that they are facing.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jose Luis tiene 24 años de edad, es soltero, universitario, es un joven emprendedor y responsable que a su corta edad ha sabido sustentarse gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio es así que hoy solicita el crédito para poder implementar y mejorar algunas herramientas de trabajo él tiene una sala de juegos de Play Station 2 y 3, el necesita dinero para comprar controles y algunos repuestos para arreglar los televisores necesarios para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes de tal forma que le ayudara a prestar sus servicios de manera  mas eficientemente ya que con el crédito otorgado cree mejorar sus ingresos y de esa  forma superarse y crecer  además de llevar una mejora vida, afirmando que con el dinero que se le piensa prestar le será mas fácil avanzar en el sueño que quiere lograr,  además de sentirse mas satisfecho de haber logrado lo que quiso sin ayuda de nadie, lo mismo que contribuirá a lograr a futuro muchas de las aspiraciones que tiene como la de contar con una casa propia.
texts.en: José Luis, 24, is a single university student and a young, responsible entrepreneur who has been able to support himself thanks to his effort and sacrifice.  The loan his is requesting is to buy and improve some of the tools of his trade.  He runs a videogames center with Play Station 2 and 3, and needs to buy joysticks and spare parts to fix the TV sets.  This is to offer his customers better and more efficient service.  He hopes to be able to improve his income through the loan, so he can expand and lead a better lifestyle.  With the help of the loan, it will be easier for him to advance toward his goals.  He   feels good about having obtained what he has without anyone's help; and he knows he is going to be able to meet new goals in the future, such as buying his own house.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for TV sets and joysticks for game consoles.

loans.name: Aydee Florencia

texts.es: Aydee nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, chanchos, gallinas y entre otros, ella también se dedica a la venta de verduras como por ejemplo papas, perejil, lechuga, cebollas, zanahorias y otras cosas más, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimentos como por ejemplo pasto, forraje, granos y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Aydee was born in the village of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba.  She lives in the same district where she was born (The district of Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca, department of Cusco).  She is 50, married and has four children.  She raises small animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, chickens and other animals, and also sells vegetables such as potatoes, parsley, lettuce, onions, carrots, etc.  This time she is requesting a loan to buy animal feed such as hay, fodder, grain and other items.  She belongs to the communal bank "Pro Mujer de Huayocari" which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is a very responsible, collaborative person.

loans.use: To buy animal feed such as hay, fodder, grain and other items.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es: Natalia nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene seis hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de granos secos como por ejemplo cebada, maíz, trigo entre otros, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar granos secos como cebada y maíz, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Natalia was born in the village of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba, and she still lives in the same district (the district of Hayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca, department of Cusco).  She is 37 years old, married and has six children.  She sells dry grains such as barley, corn and wheat.  On this occasion she is requesting a loan to buy barley and corn.  She belongs to the communal bank "Pro Mujer de Huayocari" which belongs to the Arariwa Association.  She is a responsible, collaborative person.

loans.use: To buy dry grains such as barley and corn.

loans.name: Edil

texts.es: Edil tiene 33 años, desde muy niño trabajo en las actividades del chaco con su padre hace como 15 años decidieron dedicarse a la producción de banano, con esfuerzos muy fuertes de toda la  familia lograron cultivar alrededor de 15 hectáreas de banano en conjunto con sus hermanos y padres, al paso de  los años su padre decidió ceder en compra y venta 5 hectáreas de  banano a cada uno de sus hijos, al contar con estos ingresos edil decidió superarse un poco mas ingreso a la universidad Indígena que le brindaba muchos beneficios para empezar una carrera en acuicultura o piscicultura, hace dos años atrás que se encuentra estudiando se encuentra en séptimo semestre de la carrera, para poder continuar con los trabajos de chaco convino sus actividades en sus días  libres se dedica a la parcela, en estos últimos años estas actividades lo llevaron a requerir un trasporte mas nuevo para poder trasladarse con mayor facilidad a sus actividades agrícolas y estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Edil is 33 years old. Since he was a small child, he has worked in agriculture with his father. Around 15 years ago, they decided to focus on banana production. With a lot of effort from the whole family, they managed to cultivate around 15 hectares of banana, together with his siblings and parents. With the passage of time, his father decided to hand over, through purchase and sales, 5 hectares of bananas to each of his children. With this income, Edil decided to overcome a little more; he entered the Indigenous University that provided him with a lot of benefits for starting a career in aquaculture or fish farming. He has been studying for two years and is in the seventh semester of the degree. In order to be able to continue with the agricultural work, he undertakes these activities in his free days, working on the land. In these last years, these activities have led him to require newer transport to be able to get around more easily between his agricultural activities and university studies.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to commute to his agricultural plot.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 48 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Josefina was born in the village of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba, and continues to live in the district (Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca, department of Cusco).  She is 48, married and has five children.  For a living she grows crops and raises livestock.  On this occasion, she is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and other supplies.  She belongs to the communal bank "Pro Mujer de Huayocari", which belongs to the Arariwa Association, and is a responsible, collaborative person.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and other supplies.

loans.name: Yonilda

texts.es: Yonilda nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 20 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre pero todavía no tienes hijos, ella estudia enfermería y está cursando el primer semestre en una universidad particular de la ciudad del Cusco, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar sus estudios superiores o sea va pagar su matrícula, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Yonilda was born in the population center of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba and lives in the same district where she was born. (The district of Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Cacla in the department of Cusco). She is 20 years old and in a common-law marriage, but they do not have any children yet. She is studying to become a nurse and is in the first semester in a private university in the city of Cusco.  At this time, she needs a loan to pay her tertiary studies, in other words her tuition fees. She is a member of the communal bank “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” of the Arariwa Association. She is a responsible and collaborative person.

loans.use: to pay her enrollment fees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan nació en la ciudad de Anta pero vive en el distrito de Huayllabamba de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, él tiene 49 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos, él se dedica a la ganadería y la agricultura pues es una herencia de sus padres, él compra verduras y despues lleva a vender sus verduras a diferentes mercados de la provincia del Cusco, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar verduras como por ejemplo zanahorias, cebollas y otras cosas más, él es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en: Juan was born in the city of Anta, but he lives in the district of Huayllabamba in the province of Calca, departament of Cuzco, He is 49 years old and is married. From this beautiful relationship he has four children. He works raising cattle and farming, something he inherited from his parents. He buys vegetables and sells them in different markets in the province of Cuzco. At this time, he needs the loan to buy vegetables such as carrots, onions and more. He is a responsible person who belongs to the  communal bank named “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” of the Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, such as carrots, onions and more.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel nació en la ciudad de Anta pero vive en el distrito de Huayllabamba de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, él tiene 47 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene seis hijos, él se dedica a la ganadería y la agricultura pues es una herencia de sus padres, también él se dedica a la crianza animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abano, él pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en: Miguel was born in the city of Anta but he lives in the district of Huayllabamba in the province of Calca, departament of Cuzco. He is 47 years old, married and from this beautiful relationship has six children. He works raising cattle and in farming, things he inherited from his parents. He also riases small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. At this time, he needs the loan to buy fertilizer. He belongs to the “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cuzco.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es: Nicolasa nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 52 años de edad, es viuda pero tiene dos hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura pues es una herencia de sus padres entonces ella siembra y cosecha diferentes tipos de verduras como por ejemplo repollo, choclos, zanahorias, brocoli, cebollas, habas, rocoto y otras más, ella vende sus verduras en diferentes mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar verduras por lotes o sea va comprar rocoto, zanahorias entre otros, ella también se dedica al crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Nicolasa was born in the small town of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba and lives in the same district where she was born. (The district of Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca in the department of Cusco). She is 53 years old. She is a widow, but has two children. She works in agriculture, an inheritance from her parents. So, she sows and harvests different types of vegetable such as cabbage, corn, carrots, broccoli, onions, beans, hot peppers and more. She sells her vegetables in various markets in the city of Cusco. At this time, she requires a loan to buy vegetables in batches, in other words to buy hot peppers and carrots among other vegetables. Nicolasa also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other animals. She is a member of the communal bank “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” with Asociación Arariwa. She is a responsible and collaborative person.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in batches, in other words to buy hot peppers and carrots among other vegetables.

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.es: Purificación nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 40 años de edad, es casada pero tiene seis hijos de las cuales dos son independientes y cuatro depende de ella, ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, ella siembra y cosecha diferentes tipos de verduras como por ejemplo repollo, choclos, zanahorias, brocoli, cebollas, habas, rocoto y entre otras más, ella vende sus verduras en diferentes mercados de las ciudades del Cusco, Urubamba y Calca, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Purificación was born in the town of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba and lives in the same district in which she was born (the district of Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca in the department of Cuzco). She is 40 years old, married and has six children. Two of them are on their own and four of them depend on her. She works in agriculture and raising small animals. She plants and sells different types of vegetables such as cabbage, corn, carrots, broccoli, onions, beans, peppers and more. She sells vegetables in different markets of the cities of Cuzco, Urubamba and Calca. At this time, she needs the loan to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She belongs to the “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa. She is a responsible and cooperative person.

loans.use: to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Emperatriz

texts.es: Emperatriz nació en el centro poblado de Huayocari del distrito de Huayllabamba y vive en el mismo distrito donde nació. (El distrito de Huayllabamba pertenece a la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco), ella tiene 46 años de edad y casada pero aun no tiene hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura pues es una herencia de sus padres entonces ella siembra y cosecha diferentes tipos de verduras como por ejemplo repollo, choclos, zanahorias, brocoli, cebollas, habas y otras más, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar verduras por lotes o sea va comprar repollo y choclo, ella también se dedica al crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” de la Asociación Arariwa pues es una persona responsable y colaboradora.
texts.en: Emperatriz was born in the small town of Huayocari in the district of Huayllabamba and lives in the same district where she was born. (The district of Huayllabamba belongs to the province of Calca in the department of Cusco). She is 45 years old and married, but they still do not have any children. Emperatriz works in agriculture, an inheritance from her parents. So, she sows and harvests different types of vegetables such as cabbage, corn, carrots, broccoli, onions, beans and more. At this time, she requires a loan to buy vegetables in batches, in other words to buy cabbage and corn.  She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and other animals. She is a member of the communal bank “Pro Mujer De Huayocari” with Asociación Arariwa. She is a responsible and collaborative person.

loans.use: to buy cabbage and corn.

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es: La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ceviche de forma ambulatoria en una de las calles de la ciudad del Cusco,  ella sale a vender el rico ceviche en su puesto de venta improvisado desde las 9:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m. ella saca adelante a su familia y le va muy bien, ella solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para preparar el ceviche como por ejemplo arroz, pescado, limón, cebolla, maíz, lechuga, apio y otras cosas más, ella socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Eliana is a street vender selling ceviche (a seafood dish) on a city street in Cusco. She goes out to sell the delicious ceviche from her improvised stall from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. It is going well, and she gets her family ahead. She is requesting the loan to buy inputs for the preparation of the ceviche such as rice, fish, lemon, onion, corn, lettuce and celery among other ingredients. She is happy to have the loan and commits to making her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy inputs for the preparation of the ceviche such as rice, fish, lemon, onion, corn, lettuce and celery among other ingredients.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
According to Virginia, "Poverty is not a hindrance to success." She is a hard-working mother who runs a variety store in her community. She is 49 years old and has only one child. Despite being a widow, she has the strong determination to uplift her family's status of living to give her child a better life. She has been operating her variety store for almost 20 years and usually earns a profit of 9,000 PHP every month. She uses this money to pay for her family's daily consumption and provide an allowance for her child's schooling. 

Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she needs to earn a higher income to cover up their necessities and continue sending her child to school. She planned to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customer demand. However, due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional 20,000 PHP to buy snack food, soaps, biscuits, canned goods, noodles, eggs, and beverages for sale. She is hoping that this loan will help her to improve the business and make it more profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy snack food and beverages to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Bonfal West, Bayombong, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: La socia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Imasumac II”, ella se sigue dedicando a la elaboración de jugos, ella sigue vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco desde las 07:00 de la mañana hasta las 05:00 de la tarde aproximadamente, ella es una persona responsable que saca adelante a su familia, ella solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo plátanos, naranjas, papaya entre otras, ella se siente muy agradecida por el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus pagos de sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Doris continues belonging to the communal bank “Imasumac II” and continues in her juice-production business. She continues to sell in one of the markets in the city of Cusco from 7 a.m. to approximately 5 p.m. She is a responsible person that gets her family ahead. She is requesting the loan to purchase inputs such as bananas, oranges and papayas among other fruits. She feels grateful for the loan granted and commits to making her established loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase inputs such as bananas, oranges and papayas among other fruits.

loans.name: Jeremy

texts.en:
Jeremy works hard to support her family. Jeremy is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Jeremy requested a 13000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Jeremy has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Jeremy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Leticia works hard to support her family.

She has a general store in the Philippines and also earns additional income from farming rice. Leticia is borrowing 19000 PHP through NWTF to buy stocks like soap, shampoo, spices, soft drinks, and other items to sell in her general store.

Leticia has sustained her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money so she can afford to send her her children to college.

loans.use: to buy stocks of soap, shampoo, spices, and soft drinks to sell in her general store.
